entry.content:
This is hte second article!!!! LINUX

this is an awesome yaml syntax highlighting

hired-help

Some basic ansible scripts for checking network settting, services and applicaiton versions on Centos

cabot

Rules Engine at that build agents that monitor and act on your behalf. Similar to IFTTT.

hugin

Self-hosted, easily-deployable monitoring and alerts service - like a lightweight PagerDuty

IOT

HOWTO for connecting Modtronix inAir4 to Arudino Pro Micro.
